About

April 29, 2018

I’m a Certified Information Systems Auditor (CISA) and Director of Technical Services at AMAEYA, where we work with companies to improve their infrastructure performance, network & security.

I’m also founder of the Coffee & Iced Tea podcast network and currently co-host & produce the following shows:

  • Coffee & Iced Tea, talking entrepreneurship & business
  • Drishti talk, on policy, governance & society in India
  • The Two Vegans, on raising awareness & adopting a vegan lifestyle
  • t3chtree, on consumer & enterprise technology with a focus on our side of the world

Feel free to get in touch. Twitter or Micro blog are the quickest ways.

Chirag Desai @Chirag
